足芸: (あしげい) - tricks performed with the feet
足萎え: (あしなえ) - lameness/cripple; (跛 only) mismatched pair (of shoes, etc.)
足袋: (たび) - tabi; Japanese socks (with split toe)
足裏: (あなうら) - sole of the foot
足触り: (あしざわり) - feel (to the foot); feel (underfoot)
足許: (あしもと) - at one's feet/underfoot/one's step (as in "watch your step"); gait/pace/step; you/thou
足跡: (そくせき) - footprints; record of page visitors (e.g. in social networking sites)
足跡を残す: (そくせきをのこす) - to leave one's footprints; to leave one's mark on; to leave a message (behind)
足踏み: (ashibumi) - stepping (in place), stamping (para cima e para baixo), stomping, marking time (for a soldier); standstill, stalemate
足軽大将: (あしがるたいしょう) - (yoji) samurai in command of a troop of foot soldiers
足輪: (あしわ) - leg band (e.g. on bird or hospital patient); ring; anklet
足運び: (あしはこび) - gait/manner of walking/footwork (e.g. in sport); {sumo} characteristic way of moving, keeping the center of gravity low (centre)
足長おじさん: (あしながおじさん) - anonymous scholarship system for orphans whose parents have been killed in traffic accidents (from Daddy-Long-Legs, a 1912 novel by Jean Webster); harvestman/daddy longlegs (arachnid of order Opiliones)
足長蜘蛛: (アシナガグモ) - Tetragnatha praedonia (species of long-jawed orb weaver)
足関節: (あしかんせつ) - foot joint; ankle
足骨: (あしぼね) - bones of the feet; the strength of one's feet
足高蜘蛛: (アシダカグモ) - huntsman spider (Heteropoda venatoria)
趾行性: (しこうせい) - digitigrade (walking on the toes)
跋扈跳梁: (ばっこちょうりょう) - (yoji) evildoers being rampant and roaming at will
跑足: (だくあし) - trot (as in horse riding)
跛行: (ひこう) - limp; imbalance; unfavorable progress; unfavourable progress
跛行婚: (はこうこん) - international marriage which is recognized in only one party's country (e.g. same-sex marriage, polygamy, underage marriage)
跛行景気: (はこうけいき) - spotty economic boom
距てる: (へだてる) - to separate (by distance, time, etc.)/to isolate/to partition/to divide; to interpose/to have between; to alienate/to estrange
距跋渉毛: (きょけつしょうげ) - rope weapon with a sickle on one end and a ring on the other
距離を開く: (きょりをひらく) - to open the distance
距離感: (きょりかん) - sense of distance (physical or emotional); feeling of distance
距離標: (きょりひょう) - distance mark; milepost
跟骨: (ごんこつ) - calcaneus; calcaneum; heel bone
跡: (seki/ato) - tracks , trace, tracks, mark, sign; site, remains, ruins; scar
跡づける: (あとづける) - to trace; to inquire into
跡をつける: (あとをつける) - to tag along/to follow; to leave tracks
跡を付ける: (あとをつける) - to tag along/to follow; to leave tracks
跡を濁す: (あとをにごす) - to leave a bad impression behind
跡を絶たない: (あとをたたない) - never ceasing; never ending; endless
跡を絶つ: (あとをたつ) - to wipe out; to put an end to
跡を追う: (あとをおう) - to pursue; to die right after a loved one/to kill oneself (because one misses or longs to be with a loved one); to follow an example set by earlier generations (or one's master, etc.)
跡付ける: (あとづける) - to trace; to inquire into
跡切れる: (とぎれる) - to pause; to be interrupted
跡取り: (あととり) - heir; heiress; inheritor; successor
跡取り娘: (あととりむすめ) - one's daughter and heiress
跡取り息子: (あととりむすこ) - son and heir; son who will succeed one
跡始末: (あとしまつ) - settlement (of affairs); remedial measures; cleaning up afterwards
跡強請り: (あとねだり) - demanding again what one has already obtained; coaxing out of someone for a second time
跡形もなく: (あとかたもなく) - without leaving any trace
跡形も無く: (あとかたもなく) - without leaving any trace
跡片付け: (あとかたづけ) - tidying up; cleaning; clearing away; putting in order
跡目: (あとめ) - headship of a family; family property
跡絶え: (とだえ) - pause; intermission; break; interruption; suspension
跡絶える: (とだえる) - to stop; to cease; to come to an end
跡追い心中: (あとおいしんぢゅう) - suicide immediately after the death of one's spouse or lover; following one's lover (husband, wife) into death
跣足: (せんそく) - barefoot; (はだし only) superior to (a professional, etc. in ability or achievement)
跨がる: (またがる) - to extend over/to extend into; to straddle
跨ぐ: (またぐ) - to step over/to step across/to stride over/to stride across/to cross; to stretch over/to span/to bridge/to saddle/to straddle
